description: ACF files are used by newer versions of the Steam content delivery system. Older versions use .GCF and .NCF files.

common_filenames.description: F16.acf - The file Google Earth Pro uses to simulate flying an F-16.
SR22.acf - The file Google Earth Pro uses to simulate flying an SR22.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .acf file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: ACF file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
